port.title: Flipper Zero Serial Port
port.description: Please enter the serial port name of your Flipper Zero device. In Linux, it is usually something like /dev/ttyACM0 or /dev/ttyACM1. In Windows, it is usually something like COM1 or COM2.

port_linux.title: Flipper Zero Serial Port
port_linux.description: Please enter the serial port name of your Flipper Zero device. In Linux, it is usually something like /dev/ttyACM0 or /dev/ttyACM1.

port_windows.title: Flipper Zero Serial Port
port_windows.description: Please enter the serial port name of your Flipper Zero device. In Windows, it is usually something like COM1 or COM2. You can find the port name in the Device Manager under Ports (COM & LPT).

port_auto_detected.title: Flipper Zero Serial Port
port_auto_detected.description: Please enter the serial port name of your Flipper Zero device. But seems like we have already detected it. If you want to change it, please enter the new port name.
